title: Simple DI Container
description: Build a minimal dependency injection container to understand how DI frameworks work internally.
instructions: Create a Container class that can register and resolve dependencies by type name. Register a greeting service and resolve it.

hints.text: Use a MutableMap<String, () -> Any> to store factories
register stores a lambda that creates the instance
resolve calls the lambda and returns the result

commonMistakes.correction: Store a factory lambda, invoke it on resolve
Throw a clear error or return null for missing registrations

commonMistakes.mistake: Using concrete types instead of interfaces
commonMistakes.correction: Register by interface name for loose coupling
